column5: This really stinks. Started going to Knobby's back in 1984. Hopefully they can rebuild in the same spot. PjShorthorn
Just got a news flash.knobbies restaurant is on fire and looks like it will burned to the ground.bad news for yhe town of sioux lookout.i used to always go there
This is a sad day for sure. All those great trophies gone. Will be missed. A great stop on our way to Lake Saint Joseph.
How sad. Another old friend gone.
Very sad to see this.............. lots of memories from there. Always such a nice view to watch the planes come in and go out.
Wow, we were planning on eating there next week. Sad, sad news.

Probably one "good" thing is that Knobby's was kind of "by itself" in its location, as in - no other buildings real close by. Looks like the wind was from the west, but I didn't see any real high flames.
